sources.title: The Day The Earth Stopped | Full Movie | Action Sci-Fi Adventure | C. Thomas Howell | Judd Nelson
sources.description:
The Day The Earth Stopped - Hundreds of massive intergalactic robots appear in all of the world's major capitals with an ultimatum: Prove the value of human civilization or be destroyed.
2008.  Stars: C. Thomas Howell, Judd Nelson, Darren Dalton
